{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06726v1", "title": "On the Vinogradov bound by the Diophantine type", "summary": "In this article, we give an asymptotic bound for the exponential sum of the
M\"obius function $\sum_{n \le x} \mu(n) e(\alpha n)$ for a fixed irrational
number $\alpha\in\mathbb{R}$. This exponential sum was originally studied by
Davenport and he obtained an asymptotic bound of $x(\log x)^{-A}$ for any
$A\ge0$. Our bound depends on the irrationality exponent $\eta$ of $\alpha$. If
$\eta \le 5/2$, we obtain a bound of $x^{4/5 + \varepsilon}$ and, when $\eta
\ge 5/2$, then our bound becomes $x^{(2\eta-1)/2\eta + \varepsilon}$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-09T09:31:12Z"}
